are_you_looking_for_a_simple: Are you looking for a simple and cost-effective solution to get your ideal vehicle? With our hassle-free lease-to-own option, you may drive your automobile right away and make reasonable payments over a 24-month period.

rather_than_relying_on: Rather than relying on long-term finance, you can own your car in as little as two years.

avoid_lengthy_wait: Avoid lengthy wait times and get your vehicle on the road as soon as possible!
there_are_many_different: There are many different new and used cars to choose from.

experience_premium_comfort: Experience premium comfort and elegance with our Mercedes-Benz V-Class rental service with a professional driver. Whether for business trips, airport transfers, VIP events, or family travel, our luxury van ensures a smooth and stylish ride.

we_specialize_in_providing: At ENTAKLY MOTORS, we specialize in providing premium car rental services, seamless vehicle exports, and hassle-free car sales. Based in Dubai, JBR we cater to both local and international clients, ensuring a smooth and reliable experience in the automotive industry.

Whether you’re looking to rent a car for a day, buy your dream car, or export vehicles internationally, our over 10 years experienced specialists here to serve you.
you_will_be_asked_to_provide: You will be asked to provide a valid payment instrument, in order to complete the booking.
a_fee_will_be_charged: A fee will be charged if the booking is cancelled.
cancellation_fees_are_based_on: Cancellation fees are based on your final selection and will be displayed on the page where you finalize your booking.
if_you_cancel_after: If you cancel after the scheduled pick-up time, no refund will be given.

investing_in_hybrid_and_electric_vehicle: Investing in hybrid & electric vehicles to reduce carbon emissions.
implementing_paperless_contracts: Implementing paperless contracts, digital invoicing, and energy-efficient facilities.
ensuring_eco_friendly_recycling: Ensuring eco-friendly recycling of vehicle parts and materials.

promoting_diversity: Promoting diversity, equal opportunities, and fair wages.
adhering_to_local_laws: Adhering to local laws and international business standards.
ensuring_customer_data_protection: Ensuring customer data protection and secure transactions.
we_are_dedicated_to_making_a_difference: At ENTAKLY MOTORS CAR RENTAL LLC, we are dedicated to making a difference while delivering exceptional car rental services. Our commitment to sustainability, safety, and ethical business defines who we are.
contact_us_today_to_learn_more: Contact Us today to Learn More
we_strive_to_provide: At ENTAKLY MOTORS CAR RENTAL LLC, we strive to provide a seamless and transparent car rental experience. Below are our rental terms and conditions to ensure clarity and a smooth rental process.
to_rent_a_vehicle: To rent a vehicle, the customer must
be_at_least_21_years: Be at least 21 years old (age may vary based on the car category)
hold_a_valid_driving_license: Hold a valid driving license (UAE or international)
provide_a_valid_passport: Provide a valid passport & Emirates ID (for UAE residents) or passport & visa (for tourists)
rental_is_calculated: Rental is calculated on a 24-hour basis
late_returns_beyond: Late returns beyond 2 hours will be charged an additional full day’s rate
extensions_must_be_requested: Extensions must be requested before the rental period expires
all_vehicles_come: All vehicles come with basic insurance (as per UAE law)
additional_full_insurance: Additional full insurance coverage is available at an extra cost
any_damage_not_covered_by_insurance: Any damage not covered by insurance
traffic_violations: Traffic violations, toll fees (Salik), and parking fines
loss_of_car_accessories: Loss of car accessories (keys, documents, etc.)
vehicles_are_provided: Vehicles are provided with a certain fuel level and must be returned with the same level
if_returned_with_less_fuel: If returned with less fuel, refueling charges will apply
the_car_must_not_be_used_for: The car must not be used for
subletting_or_commercial_use: Subletting or commercial use (unless agreed in contract)
driving_outside_the_uae: Driving outside the UAE requires written permission
the_renter_is_fully_responsible: The renter is fully responsible for any traffic fines, Salik (toll) charges, or parking violations
charges_will_be_deducted: Charges will be deducted from the security deposit or billed separately
in_case_of_a_breakdown: In case of a breakdown, contact our 24/7 roadside assistance
in_the_event_of_an_accident: In the event of an accident
call_the_police: Call the police and obtain an official report
repairs_will_only_be_done: Repairs will only be done at authorized service centers
the_car_must_be_returned: The car must be returned to the agreed location & time
any_damages_or_additional: Any damages or additional charges will be assessed at return
failure_to_return_the_car: Failure to return the car on time without notice may result in penalty fees
cancellations_must_be_made: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance
last_minute_cancellations: Last-minute cancellations may be subject to a cancellation fee
by_renting_a_car: By renting a car from ENTAKLY MOTORS CAR RENTAL LLC, you agree to these terms and conditions. For any clarifications,
